name: SUPER Fat Boy Raids the Cookie Factory
name_original: SUPER Fat Boy Raids the Cookie Factory
description:
My NES style demake of Fat Boy Raids the Cookie Factory originally created by Jamie & Simon Eddis on ezone.com back in 1997.

BEST EXPERIENCED IN FULLSCREEN MODE.

CONTROLS:

    Move/Jump - Arrow Keys or WASD

    Burp - Spacebar

    Toggle Scanlines - 1

    Toggle Music - M

If you want me to continue working on SUPER Fat Boy, let me know in the comments.
